name: RogueLite
description: 'RogueLite' is a simple randomly generated dungeon that was inspired by classic RPGs, complete with 100 floors, over 200 treasures to find and 70 monsters to hunt, and 6 playable classes plus 6 unlockable classes.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP and above Processor: Dual-core 2.2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 1 GB available space
